definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey

sentences.english: Fine texture, uniform color-make-up to show you natural luster, and the makeup is not easily come off.
sentences.chinese: 质地细致，上色均匀，不易脱妆，妆效呈现自然光泽。

sentences.english: Perhaps an import-export situation will need all your tender loving care.
sentences.chinese: 可能是一个需要你全部细致照料的进出口买卖。

sentences.english: The Xuli, describing the function division meticulous.
sentences.chinese: 胥吏的职能分工细致，各司其职。

sentences.english: Any detailed investigation would show true colors of the corrupt offical.
sentences.chinese: 任何细致的调查都会使这个贪官原形毕露。

sentences.english: I patiently filled him in on the British tradition of sherry tippling .
sentences.chinese: 我耐心细致地给他讲述了英国人畅饮雪利酒的传统。

sentences.english: Collection of data is done in an extremely surreptitious and meticulous manner.
sentences.chinese: 数据收集工作是在极其秘密细致地。

sentences.english: The rites of preparing for bed were elaborate and unchanging .
sentences.chinese: 铺床叠被是细致复杂而又一成不变的仪式。

sentences.english: It's a very finicky job to get all these little bones out of the fish.
sentences.chinese: 把这些小鱼刺从鱼里全部挑出来是个细致活儿。

sentences.english: I prefer the old fine-lined illustrations.
sentences.chinese: 我偏爱线条细致的老式插画。

sentences.english: Neutrogena Pore Refining Cleanser lets you visibly reduce the appearance of pores just by washing your face.
sentences.chinese: 露得清毛孔细致洗面乳，洁面的同时改进毛孔题目。

sentences.english: From collection to collation, they did a great deal of painstaking and careful job of proofreading and correcting.
sentences.chinese: 从搜集到整理书籍，他们作了大量细致的校雠工作。

sentences.english: One of the main features of this essay is its detailed description of scenery.
sentences.chinese: 写景细致是这篇散文的一个突出特点。

sentences.english: He has just cottoned on to the fact that he might have dealt with the matter more carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他这才领悟本来他处理这件事是可以更细致些的。

sentences.english: It moist, nourishes, renews and replenishes our skin cells, makes our skins beccoming more delicates and soft.
sentences.chinese: 保湿滋润，更新及修护皮肤细胞，让肌肤蜂细致柔嫩。

sentences.english: The forgetting of dreams is treated in the most detailed manner by Strumpell.
sentences.chinese: 对梦的遗忘问题分析得最细致的是斯顿培尔。

sentences.english: After thorough and careful measurements, we finally decided on the engineering location.
sentences.chinese: 细致的测查，我们终于决定了工程地点。

definition: thorough and detailed/exhaustive/the tedious details in full
